scripts.sitemap: set -e; cd sitemap; elm make Main.elm --optimize --output=main.js; node -e "require('./main.js').Elm.Main.init().ports.print.subscribe(console.log)" > ../publish/sitemap.txt
scripts.build: mkdir publish/js; set -e; rimraf elm-stuff; elm make src/Main.elm --output=publish/js/chaldeas.js --optimize
scripts.dev: set -e; npm run build; cd publish; (sleep 2; opener http://localhost:8000/200.html) & elm reactor
scripts.tests: set -e; cd tests; elm make Tests.elm --output=tests.js; (sleep 2; opener http://localhost:8000/tests.html) & elm reactor
